title: Problem-Based Scientific Inquiry Using Case-Based Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific principles (biology/physics/chemistry) and logical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Utilizing a smartphone-based case library system, combined with offline Project-Based Learning (PBL) workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more solution strategies through case library analysis in a given scientific problem situation.
Learners can revise and strengthen their arguments two or more times based on peer feedback and case comparisons.
Learners can explain a logical reasoning process by referencing at least two similar cases when a new scientific problem arises.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
